txt.en: 'We must save the Prince! Do not give up!'

'[placeholder]! I thought we would not meet again. The old man was not pleased to lose you as his guest, and he was very cross with Morflak. But in his wisdom he sent me forth to gain his forgiveness, and with a simple mission!'
'You think you can keep me from my Prince? You are a fool to try!'
'Death to the forces of Saruman! Death to them all! Quickly, [placeholder], we must get to the water's edge and see what has happened to the Prince!'
'Well, well, well. There is a face I have seen before!'
Instance: The Battle of the Ford, Sunset
'Look! Théodred is hard-pressed on all sides, but still he fights!'
'There is no time, [placeholder]! Prince Théodred is beset on all sides! We have to cross the river and break through the ring that surrounds him!'
'All I needed to do was kill the horse-prince! I have done this...and more beside!'
'And now I will settle my score with you!'
'Enough! Gather to me, boys! Finish this maggot once and for all!'
Grimbold has been defeated
Grimbold has been defeated
In the eastern distance, you hear a horn blowing from far away
Grimbold needs you to fight alongside him to where Théodred is suffering the fierce attacks of Saruman's forces.
In the eastern distance, you hear a horn blowing from far away
Prince Théodred is in trouble on the eyot in the middle of the Isen! You need to fight alongside Grimbold to come to the aid of the Prince!
'Oh no...the Prince has fallen!'
'Someone fights on, keeping the uruks at bay!'
In the eastern distance, you hear a horn blowing from far away
You have come to the eyot in the middle of the river Isen and have found the uruk Morflak gloating over Théodred's fallen form.
'It is Cynstan! The Prince's esquire!'
You have come to the eyot in the middle of the river Isen and have found the uruk Morflak gloating over Théodred's fallen form.
'Cynstan! No!'
'Prince Théodred, be strong!'
Talk to Grimbold
Fight alongside Grimbold to the water's edge
Talk to Grimbold on the bank of the Isen
Cross the river with Grimbold and rescue Théodred
Confront Morflak
Talk to Morflak
Defeat Morflak
'Get back! You will not touch him!'
'But I....'
You have returned with as much haste as you can to the Ford of Isen and must now try to save Prince Théodred from the forces of Saruman.
'[placeholder]! Fight only those who get in our way! We must get to the water!'
'Rohirrim! Fight on, fight on!'

Morflak's attention is drawn to the eastern bank of the Ford, but before you can take advantage of his inattention, you are yourself rooted to the spot with wonder.\n\nA line of riders has come from Rohan, and the courage of the uruks melts away as the Rohirrim prepare to charge.
